data.text: @canadiancarol1 @BobHend25497803 Did you miss the HE part
@KarinBGraham @BobHend25497803 so why the hashtag - blaming the whole of the Tory party?
@canadiancarol1 @BobHend25497803 You don’t ,because the government is relying on common sense..#HeFailed
@lCitizenErased @BobHend25497803 That’s the point he is. He’s basically saying only we are not going to follow the guidelines so you shouldn’t either.
@BobHend25497803 Do you eveb listen to the GOVT. updates.  YOU DO NOT HAVE TO ISOLATE IF YOU TEST POSITIVE

@BobHend25497803 Is he not heeding the advice?  We’re all still asked to isolate if we are positive and not intentionally infect others. Not legally mandatory but you’d think they’d try and lead by example.
@BobHend25497803 Oh what a shame it will be if #JohnsonTheRussianStooge gets a real proper dose , my heart would bleed....i think NOT!!!
